awards.title: Management and Customer gratitude after solving complex issue together with team of experts
awards.description:
Van: Philip Boardman 
Verzonden: maandag 4 januari 2016 15:19
Aan: Andre van den Hoek <andre.van.den.hoek@ericsson.com>
CC: Jan Vastersavendts <jan.vastersavendts@ericsson.com>
Onderwerp: RE: FW: IMSI unkown issue (again) - CSR "2899650, IMSI unknown in VLR issue" created

Thanks Andre…and special thanks goes to you for your efforts and skills on this and the CUDB follow up – thank you Andre!

Kind Regards,
Phil.
 
 
PHILIP BOARDMAN 
Head of Customer Support – Vodafone Customer Unit
RWCE Customer Support

Ericsson
Ericsson Telecommunications Ltd
Ashbrook Court, Central Boulevard
Coventry CV7 8PE, United Kingdom
Phone xxxxxxxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxxxxxxx
www.ericsson.com 


From: Andre van den Hoek 
Sent: 04 January 2016 14:14
To: Aravindan Govindaraj; Anshul Khanna; László Markovics; Péter Tóth A
Cc: Philip Boardman; Wiebke Bornhoeft; Konstantinos Topalis
Subject: RE: FW: IMSI unkown issue (again) - CSR "2899650, IMSI unknown in VLR issue" created

Hi Aravindan and others,

Find attached the customer gratitude mail wrt all the effort done sofar to solve this issue.
Thanks again for your support.

Regards,
<< Andre >>

awards.title: Add on Sales Champion of the month - October 2015
awards.description:
From: Raul Henrique Taboada
Sent:	maandag 9 november 2015 21:49
To:	Dávid Biró; Andre van den Hoek
Subject:	RE: Add on Sales Champion of the month - October 2015

Good job David and Andre. Excellent example of cooperation between CNS and RSC.

Keep it up !

BR//
Raul

From: Umer Chaudhary 
Sent: Monday, November 09, 2015 10:05 AM
To: Dávid Biró; Andre van den Hoek
Cc: RWCE CUSTOMER SUPPORT TEAM; Raul Henrique Taboada; Jan Vastersavendts; László Markovics; Frank Conrads
Subject: FW: Add on Sales Champion of the month - October 2015

Great job David and Andre, an excellent example of team work and innovation.

BR
Umer

From: Dariusz Piech 
Sent: 09 November 2015 08:06
To: Dávid Biró; Andre van den Hoek; 

Subject: Add on Sales Champion of the month - October 2015

Dear all,

We closed in October many good business opportunities and RWCE Add on Sales Team decided to reward you and your initiatives as our Add on Sales Winners for October 2015. We would like to stress in this way our respect for your initiatives and your active role in the Process, what resulted in significant contributions to our overall results. We would also like to stress the significance of team work, which in many cases led to the overall success.

Dávid Biró (Support Engineer, RSC) from RSC Hungary and Andre van den Hoek (CNS Engineer) from the Netherlands; David and Andre actively supported ON CALL RESUME SDP OFFER WITH SENDRECEIVE ON SIP/SIPI ROUTE with Vodafone – innovative joint initiative within CS and contribution from regional RSC

David, Andre  - please send me your photo to prepare the material for the RWCE Operations Newsletter. You will also get a special diploma. I would like to congratulate you and thank you for your great contributions. 


Thank's and best regards/Dariusz

DARIUSZ PIECH  
Operation Development Manager, Strategy & Tactical Planning/RWCE
Add on Sales Driver 

S&TP, Region Western & Central Europe

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for customer complaints from Large Telecom operators (Vodafone, KPN, Ziggo, BASE (Belgium), Tango (Luxembourg)  within the BeNeLux. Attend to regular customer meeting to discuss status of open issues and possible new issues. Come up with improvements to customer networks and when needed make suggestions for maintenance.

Analyse, correct and solve complex disturbances. This in order to ensure the continuity of the network. Implementation of a workaround or of a final solution for the issue found within the contractual agreed timeline. 
Coordinates and carries out software update activities single handed and takes part in 24/7 support ROTA. 
Advise and provide input for year planning, provide technical improvements to Technical Managers, Project Managers and Service Delivery Managers. In this way I contribute to the optimalisation and quality improvement of customer networks.

Advise customers within the borders of the requested knowledge areas in order to create an added customer value which in its turn will lead to a more satisfied customer.
Install, Integrate, Verification and Acceptation tests
*  Upgrades / Updates

Improves work proceses if needed writes technical reports and workinstructions.
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for creating, demonstrating and implementing of software packages for multiple major telecommunications companies within the Benelux. Also responsible for loading, roll-out and monitoring behaviour after  implementation of both network and node level.
profile_positions.title: ACA Engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for creating, demonstrating and implementing of software packages for multiple major telecommunications companies within the Benelux. Also responsible for loading, roll-out and monitoring behaviour after  implementation.
